column2: This Court also draws attention to Azmy and another v Attanayake and 5 Others (2010)

B.L.R 42 wherein it was emphasized that a ministerial function (performance of duty)
is  not  amenable  to  writ  jurisdiction.  What  is  meant  by  a  "ministerial  function"
